---
id: config
slug: /config
title: Configuration
toc_max_heading_level: 3
---

<!-- AUTOGENERATED: DO NOT EDIT DIRECTLY -->

You can use Environment Variables to configure your Realtime Server.




<!-- AUTOGENERATED: DO NOT EDIT DIRECTLY -->

## General Settings [#general]



### `PORT` [#PORT]

Port which you can connect your client/listeners


<ul class="method-list-group">
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Required: <code>true</code></li>
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Default: <code>4000</code></li>
</ul>

<br />


### `REPLICATION_MODE` [#REPLICATION_MODE]

Connect to database via either IPv4 or IPv6. Disregarded if database host is an IP address (e.g. '127.0.0.1') and recommended if database host is a name (e.g. 'db.abcd.supabase.co') to prevent potential non-existent domain (NXDOMAIN) errors.


<ul class="method-list-group">
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Required: <code>true</code></li>
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Default: <code>RLS</code></li>
</ul>

<br />


### `SLOT_NAME` [#SLOT_NAME]

A unique name for Postgres to track the Write-Ahead Logging (WAL). If the Realtime server dies then this slot can keep the changes since the last committed position.


<ul class="method-list-group">
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Required: <code>true</code></li>
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Default: <code>realtime_rls</code></li>
</ul>

<br />


### `TEMPORARY_SLOT` [#TEMPORARY_SLOT]

Start logical replication slot as either temporary or permanent


<ul class="method-list-group">
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Required: <code>true</code></li>
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Default: <code>false</code></li>
</ul>

<br />


### `REALTIME_IP_VERSION` [#REALTIME_IP_VERSION]

Bind realtime via either IPv4 or IPv6


<ul class="method-list-group">
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Required: <code>true</code></li>
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Default: <code>IPV6</code></li>
</ul>

<br />


### `PUBLICATIONS` [#PUBLICATIONS]

JSON encoded array of publication names. Realtime RLS currently accepts one publication.


<ul class="method-list-group">
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Required: <code>true</code></li>
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Default: <code>[\"supabase_realtime\"]</code></li>
</ul>

<br />


### `SECURE_CHANNELS` [#SECURE_CHANNELS]

Enable/Disable channels authorization via JWT verification


<ul class="method-list-group">
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Required: <code>true</code></li>
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Default: <code>true</code></li>
</ul>

<br />


### `JWT_SECRET` [#JWT_SECRET]

HS algorithm octet key (e.g. "95x0oR8jq9unl9pOIx")


<ul class="method-list-group">
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Required: <code>true</code></li>
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Default: <code>""</code></li>
</ul>

<br />


### `JWT_CLAIM_VALIDATORS` [#JWT_CLAIM_VALIDATORS]

Expected claim key/value pairs compared to JWT claims via equality checks in order to validate JWT. e.g. '{"iss": "Issuer", "nbf": 1610078130}'.


<ul class="method-list-group">
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Required: <code>true</code></li>
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Default: <code>{}</code></li>
</ul>

<br />


### `EXPOSE_METRICS` [#EXPOSE_METRICS]

Expose Prometheus metrics at '/metrics' endpoint.


<ul class="method-list-group">
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Required: <code>true</code></li>
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Default: <code>false</code></li>
</ul>

<br />


### `DB_RECONNECT_BACKOFF_MIN` [#DB_RECONNECT_BACKOFF_MIN]

Specify the minimum amount of time to wait before reconnecting to database


<ul class="method-list-group">
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Required: <code>true</code></li>
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Default: <code>100</code></li>
</ul>

<br />


### `DB_RECONNECT_BACKOFF_MAX` [#DB_RECONNECT_BACKOFF_MAX]

Specify the maximum amount of time to wait before reconnecting to database


<ul class="method-list-group">
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Required: <code>true</code></li>
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Default: <code>120000</code></li>
</ul>

<br />


### `REPLICATION_POLL_INTERVAL` [#REPLICATION_POLL_INTERVAL]

Specify how often Realtime RLS should poll the replication slot for changes


<ul class="method-list-group">
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Required: <code>true</code></li>
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Default: <code>300</code></li>
</ul>

<br />


### `SUBSCRIPTION_SYNC_INTERVAL` [#SUBSCRIPTION_SYNC_INTERVAL]

Specify how often Realtime RLS should confirm connected subscribers and the tables they're listening to


<ul class="method-list-group">
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Required: <code>true</code></li>
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Default: <code>60000</code></li>
</ul>

<br />


### `MAX_CHANGES` [#MAX_CHANGES]

Soft limit for the number of database changes to fetch per replication poll


<ul class="method-list-group">
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Required: <code>true</code></li>
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Default: <code>100</code></li>
</ul>

<br />


### `MAX_RECORD_BYTES` [#MAX_RECORD_BYTES]

Controls the maximum size of a WAL record


<ul class="method-list-group">
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Required: <code>true</code></li>
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Default: <code>1048576</code></li>
</ul>

<br />




<!-- AUTOGENERATED: DO NOT EDIT DIRECTLY -->

## Database Settings [#database]



### `DB_HOST` [#DB_HOST]

Database host URL


<ul class="method-list-group">
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Required: <code>true</code></li>
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Default: <code>localhost</code></li>
</ul>

<br />


### `DB_NAME` [#DB_NAME]

Database name


<ul class="method-list-group">
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Required: <code>true</code></li>
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Default: <code>postgres</code></li>
</ul>

<br />


### `DB_USER` [#DB_USER]

Database user


<ul class="method-list-group">
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Required: <code>true</code></li>
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Default: <code>postgres</code></li>
</ul>

<br />


### `DB_PASSWORD` [#DB_PASSWORD]

Database password


<ul class="method-list-group">
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Required: <code>true</code></li>
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Default: <code>postgres</code></li>
</ul>

<br />


### `DB_PORT` [#DB_PORT]

Database port


<ul class="method-list-group">
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Required: <code>true</code></li>
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Default: <code>5432</code></li>
</ul>

<br />


### `DB_SSL` [#DB_SSL]

Database SSL connection


<ul class="method-list-group">
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Required: <code>true</code></li>
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Default: <code>true</code></li>
</ul>

<br />


### `DB_IP_VERSION` [#DB_IP_VERSION]

Connect to database via either IPv4 or IPv6. Disregarded if database host is an IP address (e.g. '127.0.0.1') and recommended if database host is a name (e.g. 'db.abcd.supabase.co') to prevent potential non-existent domain (NXDOMAIN) errors.


<ul class="method-list-group">
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Required: <code>true</code></li>
<li class="method-list-item-label flex items-center gap-4">Default: <code>IPv4</code></li>
</ul>

<br />
